title: Techniques for activating and harnessing eye power.
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses the power of numerology and how it can be used to create a "keyword" to trigger a fascination force. The author also mentions the Divya Netra meditation technique used in India, which involves focusing on the Ajna Chakra and using the third eye. In this final part, the author delves into another technique called the Bishoff method, which involves observing an eye design to harness its power. Additionally, the author explores ancient designs that may have also been used to intensify the potency of the eye.
content: Metodo Bishoff Además que la fijación de los ojos de una foto pronunciando las cifras, otra técnica expresada por Bishoff (y por lo tanto de origen alemán) consiste en la observación de un ojo diseñado. También aquí nos empadronamos del poder relacionado a este órgano. Existen varios pasos. En principio la atención va dirigida fijamente al punto central. Sucesivamente la mirada va ampliando hasta el contorno global de los ojos, para volver en fin al punto central. En fin, cerrando los ojos se recuerda la forma de esto. last_phrase: In conclusion, these techniques and traditions that focus on the power of the eye have been around for centuries and may have had the same purpose of enhancing its potential. By practicing the Bishoff method, observing and memorizing designs, and understanding the symbolism behind ancient traditions, we can tap into the power of our eyes and use them to our advantage.
